entry.title: 15min SUNDRIED TOMATO PASTA 🍝 Too lazy to cook? Then make this pasta! I also like serving it with veggies and tempeh to make it a complete meal.😋 RECIPE (1 serving, 15min prep time): -1 serving of pasta Cook al dente and save some pasta water. -65g sun

entry.title: LAZY MUSHROOM PASTA 🍝 Inspired by @dr.vegan, super easy and super delicious! 😋 RECIPE (1 serving, 20min prep time): -150g mushrooms, sliced -1 small onion, sliced -a spring of thyme -1 Tsp paprika -salt to taste Mix with a drizzle of oil. -1 big Tbsp ve
entry.content: LAZY MUSHROOM PASTA 🍝 Inspired by @dr.vegan, super easy and super delicious! 😋 RECIPE (1 serving, 20min prep time): -150g mushrooms, sliced -1 small onion, sliced -a spring of thyme -1 Tsp paprika -salt to taste Mix with a drizzle of oil. -1 big Tbsp ve

entry.title: My favorite soy recipes 😇👇 Whipped tofu RECIPE (4 servings, 10min prep time): -250g firm tofu -2 Tsp oil -4 Tsp maple syrup -juice and zest of 1/2 lemon -1 Tsp vanilla -2 to 3 Tbsp water Blend until smooth. Use on toast as dip. It’ll last in the fridge
entry.content: My favorite soy recipes 😇👇 Whipped tofu RECIPE (4 servings, 10min prep time): -250g firm tofu -2 Tsp oil -4 Tsp maple syrup -juice and zest of 1/2 lemon -1 Tsp vanilla -2 to 3 Tbsp water Blend until smooth. Use on toast as dip. It’ll last in the fridge

entry.title: - What I eat in a day -post marathon edition 🏃‍♀️😋 Reminder: Vergleiche dich nicht mit anderen, jeder ist einzigartig und hat andere Bedürfnisse.🫶 Breakky: -120 ml Pflanzenmilch -1 Messlöffel veganes Proteinpulver -Zimt -1 EL gemahlene Leinsamen -3 Scheib

entry.title: CHEUNG FUN (hack) 😋 Cheung fun in China or Bánh cuốn in Vietnam are ultra thin sheets of rice noodles that can be filled with various fillings and topped with different sauces… perfect for summer!🫶 RECIPE (6 rolls, 25min prep time): -250g of your favorite
entry.content: CHEUNG FUN (hack) 😋 Cheung fun in China or Bánh cuốn in Vietnam are ultra thin sheets of rice noodles that can be filled with various fillings and topped with different sauces… perfect for summer!🫶 RECIPE (6 rolls, 25min prep time): -250g of your favorite

entry.title: TOFISH 🐟🌱 A fun way to prepare tofu…🤭 It tastes great with a subtle fish flavor and an amazing texture! 😋 Much love Maya ✨ RECIPE (2 tofish, 50min prep time): Marinade: -1/2 Cup (125ml) water -1 sheet nori, crumbled (alternatively you can use 3 Tsp dill)
entry.content: TOFISH 🐟🌱 A fun way to prepare tofu…🤭 It tastes great with a subtle fish flavor and an amazing texture! 😋 Much love Maya ✨ RECIPE (2 tofish, 50min prep time): Marinade: -1/2 Cup (125ml) water -1 sheet nori, crumbled (alternatively you can use 3 Tsp dill)
